id: Quán lý vũ khí trang bị Cụm_LoaiThietBi

actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT 
    ltb.ten_loai_thiet_bi,
    COUNT(etbm.id) AS so_luong_thiet_bi
FROM 
    loai_thiet_bi ltb
LEFT JOIN 
    e_thiet_bi_mang etbm ON ltb.id = etbm.loai_thiet_bi_id
GROUP BY 
    ltb.ten_loai_thiet_bi;

unpublishedAction.name: LoaiThietBi
unpublishedAction.pageId: Quán lý vũ khí trang bị Cụm
